sentence: He ran at me with a knife.
information:
run at /rʌn ət/

sentence: August car sales fell short of the industry's expectations.
information:
fall short /fɔːl ʃɔːt/
(to fail to reach an amount or standard that was expected or hoped for, causing disappointment: , to not reach a desired amount or standard: )
